reviewText: This selection is a money-saving re-release.I will not repeat the product description, but,this is TWO (2) previously released DVDs withtheir contents put into one DVD case --- and ata savings of what I paid a year ago:It isGoosebumps: The Headless GhostandGoosebumps: Ghost BeachSo, pay $12, each, seperately, or get both on ONEfor $12.Should be a no-brainer, right?
Title: N/A

reviewText: I remember almost all of the episodes of the Goosebumps series from being a kid and this was my show. I still have all of my books & some of the videos. I just remembered the story of the boy obsessed with strawberry ice cream and the dum-waiter fell on him and took off his head. Well yea that and 5 other episodes,ghost beach awesome ants and some others. Great if you remember the show and have kids and want to show em what you were into when you were a kid. I thought hey 5 bux why not. I dig R.L. Stine to this day and im 23
Title: N/A

reviewText: This was a fun and spooky DVD. If you are a fan of the Goosebumps series (either in book format or the show) you will enjoy this. Each of the episodes will leave you looking over your shoulder (at least a bit) which for me is fun. Saying this though I may still say that this may not be appropriate for younger children as it could give them bad dreams. My oldest daughter and I watched these and she thoroughly enjoyed them and asked if we could watch them again which is always a good sign! All-in-all this was a great collection of shows that I would highly recommend!

reviewText: A great deal at two for the price of one. My kids have always loved Goosebumps movies. Good, clean fun for the whole family.

reviewText: My grandsons and I really enjoy the "Goosebumps" collection on DVD.  I hope to purchase more of them.  R.L. Stine is an excellent author for the young and for grammas.
